channel.title: Steam ID not updating
channel.description:
Like the title says. It's linked correctly to my community alias, I'm online, profile is set to public view, so I dunno what's wrong. It has the wrong avatar, wrong name and states I'm offline, even though I'm online as I type this (and will be for the rest of the day). Any ideas?
EDIT: I'm using Chrome if that's any help...

item.title: Steam ID not updating
item.dc:creator: Nosehole
item.description:
Had same problem. Maxeys fix works. Just for reference.

Thanks dude!

Read full topic

item.title: Steam ID not updating
item.dc:creator: Skilgannon
item.description:
Well, thing is, it’s always worked before with the community alias. In this instance: darknessabsolute. So I’m a bit confused as to why it’s stopped working now. I will give your suggestion a go though…

EDIT: Works now, thanks Maxey.

Read full topic

item.title: Steam ID not updating
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Use the profile number, not the profile name.

You can see your profile number by hovering your mouse cursor over the steam profile thing on the forum.

It’s a bit weird how it shows your profile number anyway and still doesn’t work correctly, but that’s how it is.

Read full topic

item.title: Steam ID not updating

item.description:
Like the title says. It’s linked correctly to my community alias, I’m online, profile is set to public view, so I dunno what’s wrong. It has the wrong avatar, wrong name and states I’m offline, even though I’m online as I type this (and will be for the rest of the day). Any ideas?
